home.title: Decentralized Cloud Foundation
home.subtitle: DCF (Decentralized Cloud Foundation) funds and incubates teams and projects, to build decentralized cloud infrastructure and applications of Web3.0

program.title: Crust Grants Program
program.content: DCF has funded the decentralized storage project Crust Network and will extend the effort to the funding of development and research projects that drive user experience, business potential and technical innovation.

stack.title: Decentralized Cloud Storage Stack
stack.content: You effectively enhance the value of the decentralized cloud by working on the following layers.

apply.title: Application
apply.content: Crust Grants Program offers funding up to $30,000 for each recipient. In addition, it includes necessary technical and resource support to accelerate your project.
